description: This file defines an ApiClient class that provides methods to interact with a REST API for a multiplayer game. It encapsulates fetch-based HTTP requests with predefined headers and URL handling, supporting operations such as creating and joining rooms, starting games, performing dice rolls, and moving tokens.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A lightweight REST client class wrapping fetch to handle API requests related to game rooms, players, and game actions.

methods.name: constructor()
methods.description: Initializes the ApiClient instance, setting the base URL from environment configuration and default headers.

methods.name: _url(path)
methods.description: Constructs a full URL from a given path, ensuring proper slash handling.

methods.name: _request(path, options = {})
methods.description: Performs a fetch request with error handling, response parsing, and content-type detection.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified API path.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified API path, with optional JSON body.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request to the specified API path, with optional JSON body.

methods.name: del
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified API path.

methods.name: getRooms
methods.description: Fetches the list of available game rooms.

methods.name: createRoom
methods.description: Creates a new game room with specified parameters.

methods.name: joinRoom
methods.description: Join an existing room by code with player info.

methods.name: leaveRoom
methods.description: Leave a room with a given code.

methods.name: setReady
methods.description: Set the player's ready status within a room.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Start the game in a specific room.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Fetch the current state of a room or game.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Move a game token after a roll.
